item.title: My Developer Story
item.description: Hello everyone, I’m starting this blog to share and keep track of my journey as a software developer … I’m a french guy who loves to discover and to learn about the tech. I started by creating a website to share some books with a friend when I was 14 years old back in 2011. It was done with some vanilla php and basic html/css and no framework! After some years with less coding I started again only 2 years ago when I decided to create the website for one of my school association : still available here.
